main.name: Chathurika Senani
main.occupation: Web developer, programmer and a Blogger.
main.description: I am an Undergraduate from SUSL. Anita Borg Scholarship Recepient. Member of Women Tech Makers Community.
main.bio: I am a fourth year student who is passionate about technologies. My technology stack includes Java Enterprise Edition, ASP.NETMVC, React, Django.
